Posts.EditableText:
Anyways CC, thanks for the vote of confidence... didn't last long though; in fact, I received a death threat.  Can't beat that!  Well, I guess you could... by actually carrying out the task.  So what do you say GB... are you gonna take the short amount of time to fly to Wisconsin and complete your mission? Maybes don't count. Yes or no.  I'm not asking you to tell me the answer... you know, leave me guessing, so I can shrink in ever-lasting fear. Drip... there goes the sweat.

Ok, anyways, I was seeking a reply from DavidW, but thanks Gameboy and TrOn for your input. It's such a measly battle.
